org.virtualbox_4_2
Class IHostNetworkInterface

java.lang.Object
  org.virtualbox_4_2.IUnknown
      org.virtualbox_4_2.IHostNetworkInterface

public class IHostNetworkInterface
extends IUnknown

Represents one of host's network interfaces. IP V6 address and network mask are strings of 32 hexdecimal digits grouped by four. Groups are separated by colons. For example, fe80:0000:0000:0000:021e:c2ff:fed2:b030. Interface ID: {87A4153D-6889-4DD6-9654-2E9FF0AE8DEC}
